price: 5. ¡Oh, gentes!, la promesa de Al-lah es cierta. No se dejen seducir por la vida mundanal ni por el seductor (del Demonio porque se apartarían del camino de Al-lah).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun falā taghurrannakumu al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā walā yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharūru
